title: LANACARE Organic Wool Toddler/Baby Pants
features: Made of soothingly soft KbT, GOTS, IVN Best Certified Organic Merino Wool.
Adjustable waistband for perfect fit. Soft cuffing at bottom of legs.
Natural wool with lanolin gives self-cleansing properties minimizes need for washing.
For best results, wash by hand with lanolin-containing woolwash to retain self-cleansing properties.
European size corresponds to baby's length in centimeters. Age in months is estimate. 74 = 29 in.
description: Baby/Toddler Pants in slightly felted Organic Merino Wool. Adjustable elastic waistline.  European sizing correlates with baby's full-length in centimeters. 50 = 20 inches.  62 = 24.5 inches.  74 = 29 inches.  80 = 31.5 in. 86 = 34 inches.  92 = 36.25 inches.  98 = 38.5 inches.  110 = 43.3 inches. Choose size based on your baby's full length. For chunkier babies, move up one size.  The wool chosen for LANACare products is KbT-certified organic, meeting European highest standards, to provide the utmost in well-being. Soothingly soft, this fine wool comes from pure-bred merino sheep. It is sheered by hand and free of pesticides. Wool's natural lanolin provides self-cleansing properties - no need to wash after each wear, even if urine leak through diaper occurs.  Wool breathes, maintaining a comfortable temperature in warmth and cold.  Wool can absorb up to 40% of its own weight in moisture, before feeling damp. When damp, it feels warm. And wool is naturally flame-retardant, without any chemical treatment. Designed by Danish nurse. Now made in Lithuania.
details: {"Is Discontinued By Manufacturer": "No", "Department": "Baby-boys", "Date First Available": "July 5, 2011", "Manufacturer": "UAB LNA"}
